title: Excessive "Failed to publish attestation" messages after restart
body:
Reported by a large user.

Teku 22.6.1 with separate validator process.

On restart the beacon node was excessively noisy with (duplicate) warnings. Presumeably there's one message for each validator due to attest. Can we improve this?

```
2022-06-29 12:25:04.029 INFO  - Slot Event  *** Slot: 215225, Block: 2fae512b4774fd86c6366cad5833112c2605a650a26d39333e30c7e5e1f772e9, Justified: 6724, Finalized: 6723, Peers: 70
2022-06-29 12:25:13.375 WARN  - Failed to publish attestation for slot 215226 because no peers were available on the required gossip topic
```
